items.label: cor-w2-convergence-thermodynamic-limit
items.title: Wasserstein-2 Convergence in the Thermodynamic Limit
items.content:
2171: :label: cor-w2-convergence-thermodynamic-limit
2172: 
2173: The convergence of marginals to the mean-field QSD holds in the stronger Wasserstein-2 metric:
2174: 
2175: $$
2176: \lim_{N \to \infty} W_2(\mu_N, \mu_\infty) = 0
2177: 
2178: $$
items.section: ## **6. Justification of the Mean-Field Model: Propagation of Chaos and the Thermodynamic Limit**
